name: Exadimension Neptunia 2 A Chao Returns
description:
Ever watched the ending video of a Hyperdimension Neptunia game and wanted to play that 2D-style RPG? Now you can in this fan game!

Slay monsters, make video game references and break the fourth wall all in 2D Graphics! Two years after the events of Exadimension Neptunia , take control of your 3 character as they face a new threat The Chao


Game Progress 100%

Current Version: 0.4.0
Main Story
4/4 Chapters completed
The current version ends after fighting Green sister

Bugs/Issues
i got none rn

Controls
Q/W Switch Character (Equipment and Skills Menu)
Z Interact/Confirm
X Cancel/Access Menu Screen
Arrow Keys Move
Left Shift Run
Disclaimer

I have never publicly showed off this game anywhere on the Internet besides Reddit. I do not like excessively promoting anything, especially an unfinished product like this game.

Fan game based on Exadimension Neptunia by @Trainer_Brendan
all assets included

music is not by me
